articles.title: X will soon make your public posts visible to accounts you’ve blocked - TechCrunch
articles.description: X will soon change the functionality behind its block button so that if you block an account, they will still be able to see your public posts, according
articles.content: X will soon change the functionality behind its block button so that if you block an account, they will still be able to see your public posts, according to changes to X’s website spotted by independ… [+1958 chars]
